title: Testing - File read
instructions: Just run the default program to check for expected behaviour.
starter:
with open("names.txt") as f:
    data = f.read().strip()
    for line in data.split("\n"):
        print(f"Name: {line}")
print("Done")

files./main.py:

print("Done")
